content.gatha1: Vesālī nāma nagaratthi vajjīnaṃ, tattha ahu licchavi ambasakkaroambasakkharoambasakkharoappasakkaro ;
content.gathalast: Disvāna petaṃ nagarassa bāhiraṃ, tattheva pucchittha taṃ kāraṇatthiko.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Seyyā nisajjā nayimassa atthi, abhikkamo natthi paṭikkamo ca;
content.gathalast: Asitapītakhāyitavatthabhogā, paricārikāparicāraṇāparicāraṇā sāpi imassa natthi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ye ñātakā diṭṭhasutā suhajjā, anukampakā yassa ahesuṃ pubbe;
content.gathalast: Daṭṭhumpi te dāni na taṃ labhanti, virājitattovirādhitattovirādhitatto hi janena tena.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na oggatattassa bhavanti mittā, jahanti mittā vikalaṃ viditvā;
content.gathalast: Atthañca disvā parivārayanti, bahū mittā uggatattassa honti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Nihīnatto sabbabhogehi kiccho, sammakkhito samparibhinnagatto;
content.gathalast: Ussāvabindūva palimpamāno, ajja suve jīvitassūparodho.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Etādisaṃ uttamakicchappattaṃ, uttāsitaṃ pucimandassa sūle;
content.gathalast: ‘Atha tvaṃ kena vaṇṇena vadesi yakkha, jīva bho jīvitameva seyyo’’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sālohito esa ahosi mayhaṃ, ahaṃ sarāmi purimāya jātiyā;
content.gathalast: Disvā ca me kāruññamahosi rāja, mā pāpadhammo nirayaṃ patāyaṃ pati + ayaṃ = patāyaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ito cuto licchavi esa poso, sattussadaṃ nirayaṃ ghorarūpaṃ;
content.gathalast: Upapajjati dukkaṭakammakārī, mahābhitāpaṃ kaṭukaṃ bhayānakaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Anekabhāgena guṇena seyyo, ayameva sūlo nirayena tena;
content.gathalast: Ekantadukkhaṃ kaṭukaṃ bhayānakaṃ, ekantatibbaṃ nirayaṃ patāyaṃ pate + ayaṃ = patāyaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Idañca sutvā vacanaṃ mameso, dukkhūpanīto vijaheyya pāṇaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tasmā ahaṃ santike na bhaṇāmi, mā me kato jīvitassūparodho’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Aññāto esoajjhito esa purisassa attho, aññampi icchāmase pucchituṃ tuvaṃ;
content.gathalast: Okāsakammaṃ sace no karosi, pucchāma taṃ no na ca kujjhitabba’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Addhā paṭiññā me tadā ahupaṭiññātametaṃ tadāhupaṭiññā na mete tadā ahu , nācikkhanā appasannassa hoti;
content.gathalast: Akāmā saddheyyavacoti katvā, pucchassu maṃ kāmaṃ yathā visayha’’ntivisayaṃ .
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ kiñcahaṃ cakkhunā passissāmipassāmi , sabbampi tāhaṃ abhisaddaheyyaṃ;
content.gathalast: Disvāva taṃ nopi ce saddaheyyaṃ, kareyyāsikarohi me yakkha niyassakamma’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Saccappaṭiññā tava mesā hotu, sutvāna dhammaṃ labha suppasādaṃ;
content.gatha2: Aññatthiko no ca paduṭṭhacitto, yaṃ te sutaṃ asutañcāpi dhammaṃ;
content.gathalast: Sabbampi akkhissaṃsabbaṃ ācikkhissaṃ yathā pajānanti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Setena assena alaṅkatena, upayāsi sūlāvutakassa santike;
content.gathalast: Yānaṃ idaṃ abbhutaṃ dassaneyyaṃ, kissetaṃ kammassa ayaṃ vipāko’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Vesāliyā nagarassatassa nagarassatassa nagarassatassa nagarassa majjhe, cikkhallamagge narakaṃ ahosi;
content.gathalast: Gosīsamekāhaṃ pasannacitto, setaṃsetuṃsetuṃ gahetvā narakasmiṃ nikkhipiṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Etasmiṃ pādāni patiṭṭhapetvā, mayañca aññe ca atikkamimhā;
content.gathalast: Yānaṃ idaṃ abbhutaṃ dassaneyyaṃ, tasseva kammassa ayaṃ vipāko’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsati, gandho ca te sabbadisā pavāyati;
content.gathalast: Yakkhiddhipattosi mahānubhāvo, naggo cāsi kissa ayaṃ vipāko’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Akkodhano niccapasannacitto, saṇhāhi vācāhi janaṃ upemi;
content.gathalast: Tasseva kammassa ayaṃ vipāko, dibbo me vaṇṇo satataṃ pabhāsati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yasañca kittiñca dhamme ṭhitānaṃ, disvāna mantemidisvā samantemi pasannacitto;
content.gathalast: Tasseva kammassa ayaṃ vipāko, dibbo me gandho satataṃ pavāyati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sahāyānaṃ titthasmiṃ nhāyantānaṃ, thale gahetvā nidahissa dussaṃ;
content.gathalast: Khiḍḍatthiko no ca paduṭṭhacitto, tenamhi naggo kasirā ca vuttī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yo kīḷamāno pakaroti pāpaṃ, tassedisaṃ kammavipākamāhu;
content.gathalast: Akīḷamāno pana yo karoti, kiṃ tassa kammassa vipākamāhū’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ye duṭṭhasaṅkappamanā manussā, kāyena vācāya ca saṅkiliṭṭhā;
content.gathalast: Kāyassa bhedā abhisamparāyaṃ, asaṃsayaṃ te nirayaṃ upenti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Apare pana sugatimāsamānā, dāne ratā saṅgahitattabhāvā;
content.gathalast: Kāyassa bhedā abhisamparāyaṃ, asaṃsayaṃ te sugatiṃ upentī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ kinti jāneyyamahaṃ avecca, kalyāṇapāpassa ayaṃ vipāko;
content.gathalast: Kiṃ vāhaṃ disvā abhisaddaheyyaṃ, ko vāpi maṃ saddahāpeyya eta’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Disvā ca sutvā abhisaddahassu, kalyāṇapāpassa ayaṃ vipāko;
content.gathalast: Kalyāṇapāpe ubhaye asante, siyā nu sattā sugatā duggatā vā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘No cettha kammāni kareyyuṃ maccā, kalyāṇapāpāni manussaloke;
content.gathalast: Nāhesuṃ sattā sugatā duggatā vā, hīnā paṇītā ca manussaloke.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yasmā ca kammāni karonti maccā, kalyāṇapāpāni manussaloke;
content.gathalast: Tasmā hi sattā sugatā duggatā vā, hīnā paṇītā ca manussaloke.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Dvayajja kammānaṃ vipākamāhu, sukhassa dukkhassa ca vedanīyaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tā devatāyo paricārayanti, paccanti bālā dvayataṃ apassino.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na matthi kammāni sayaṃkatāni, datvāpi me natthi yo so (sabbattha) ādiseyya;
content.gathalast: Acchādanaṃ sayanamathannapānaṃ, tenamhi naggo kasirā ca vuttī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Siyā nu kho kāraṇaṃ kiñci yakkha, acchādanaṃ yena tuvaṃ labhetha;
content.gathalast: Ācikkha me tvaṃ yadatthi hetu, saddhāyikaṃsaddhāyitaṃsaddhāyitaṃ hetuvaco suṇomā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kappitakokappinako nāma idhatthi bhikkhu, jhāyī susīlo arahā vimutto;
content.gathalast: Guttindriyo saṃvutapātimokkho, sītibhūto uttamadiṭṭhipatto.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sakhilo vadaññū suvaco sumukho, svāgamo suppaṭimuttako ca;
content.gathalast: Puññassa khettaṃ araṇavihārī, devamanussānañca dakkhiṇeyyo.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Santo vidhūmo anīgho nirāso, mutto visallo amamo avaṅko;
content.gathalast: Nirūpadhī sabbapapañcakhīṇo, tisso vijjā anuppatto jutimā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Appaññāto disvāpi na ca sujāno, munīti naṃ vajjisu voharanti;
content.gathalast: Jānanti taṃ yakkhabhūtā anejaṃ, kalyāṇadhammaṃ vicarantaṃ loke.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tassa tuvaṃ ekayugaṃ duve vā, mamuddisitvāna sace dadetha;
content.gathalast: Paṭiggahītāni ca tāni assu, mamañca passetha sannaddhadussa’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kasmiṃ padese samaṇaṃ vasantaṃ, gantvāna passemu mayaṃ idāni;
content.gathalast: Yo majjasa majja kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitañca, diṭṭhīvisūkāni vinodayeyyā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Eso nisinno kapinaccanāyaṃ, parivārito devatāhi bahūhi;
content.gathalast: Dhammiṃ kathaṃ bhāsati saccanāmo, sakasmimācerake appamatto’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tathāhaṃyathāhaṃ kassāmi gantvā idāni, acchādayissaṃ samaṇaṃ yugena;
content.gathalast: Paṭiggahitāni ca tāni assu, tuvañca passemu sannaddhadussa’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Mā akkhaṇe pabbajitaṃ upāgami, sādhu vo licchavi nesa dhammo;
content.gathalast: Tato ca kāle upasaṅkamitvā, tattheva passāhi raho nisinna’’nti.
content.gatha1: Tathāti vatvā agamāsi tattha, parivārito dāsagaṇena licchavi;
content.gathalast: So taṃ nagaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, vāsūpagacchittha sake nivesane.
content.gatha1: Tato ca kāle gihikiccāni katvā, nhatvā pivitvā ca khaṇaṃ labhitvā;
content.gathalast: Viceyya peḷāto ca yugāni aṭṭha, gāhāpayī dāsagaṇena licchavi.
content.gatha1: So taṃ padesaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, taṃ addasa samaṇaṃ santacittaṃ;
content.gathalast: Paṭikkantaṃ gocarato nivattaṃ, sītibhūtaṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ.
content.gatha1: Tamenamavoca upasaṅkamitvā, appābādhaṃ phāsuvihārañca pucchi;
‘‘Vesāliyaṃ licchavihaṃ bhadante, jānanti maṃ licchavi ambasakkaro.
‘‘Imāni me aṭṭha yugā subhāni yugāni bhante (syā. ka.), paṭigaṇha bhante padadāmi tuyhaṃ;
content.gathalast: Teneva atthena idhāgatosmi, yathā ahaṃ attamano bhaveyya’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Dūratova samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca, nivesanaṃ te parivajjayanti;
content.gathalast: Pattāni bhijjanti ca te bhijjanti tava (syā. ka.) nivesane, saṅghāṭiyo cāpi vidālayantivipāṭayantivipātayanti .
content.gatha1: ‘‘Athāpare pādakuṭhārikāhi, avaṃsirā samaṇā pātayanti;
content.gathalast: Etādisaṃ pabbajitā vihesaṃ, tayā kataṃ samaṇā pāpuṇanti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tiṇena telampi na tvaṃ adāsi, mūḷhassa maggampi na pāvadāsi;
content.gatha2: Andhassa daṇḍaṃ sayamādiyāsi, etādiso kadariyo asaṃvuto tuvaṃ;
content.gatha3: Atha tvaṃ kena vaṇṇena kimeva disvā,
content.gathalast: Amhehi saha saṃvibhāgaṃ karosī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Paccemi bhante yaṃ tvaṃ vadesi, vihesayiṃ samaṇe brāhmaṇe ca;
content.gathalast: Khiḍḍatthiko no ca paduṭṭhacitto, etampi me dukkaṭameva bhante.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Khiḍḍāya yakkho pasavitvā pāpaṃ, vedeti dukkhaṃ asamattabhogī;
content.gathalast: Daharo yuvā nagganiyassa bhāgī, kiṃ su tato dukkhatarassa hoti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ disvā saṃvegamalatthaṃ bhante, tappaccayā vāpi tappaccayā tāhaṃ (sī.), tappaccayā cāhaṃ (pī.) dadāmi dānaṃ;
content.gathalast: Paṭigaṇha bhante vatthayugāni aṭṭha, yakkhassimā gacchantu dakkhiṇāyo’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Addhā hi dānaṃ bahudhā pasatthaṃ, dadato ca te akkhayadhammamatthu;
content.gathalast: Paṭigaṇhāmi te vatthayugāni aṭṭha, yakkhassimā gacchantu dakkhiṇāyo’’ti.
content.gatha1: Tato hi so ācamayitvā licchavi, therassa datvāna yugāni aṭṭha;
content.gathalast: ‘Paṭiggahitāni ca tāni assu, yakkhañca passetha sannaddhadussaṃ’.
content.gatha1: Tamaddasā candanasāralittaṃ, ājaññamārūḷhamuḷāravaṇṇaṃ;
content.gathalast: Alaṅkataṃ sādhunivatthadussaṃ, parivāritaṃ yakkhamahiddhipattaṃ.
content.gatha1: So taṃ disvā attamanā udaggo, pahaṭṭhacitto ca subhaggarūpo;
content.gathalast: Kammañca disvāna mahāvipākaṃ, sandiṭṭhikaṃ cakkhunā sacchikatvā.
content.gatha1: Tamenamavoca upasaṅkamitvā, ‘‘dassāmi dānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ;
content.gathalast: Na cāpi me kiñci adeyyamatthi, tuvañca me yakkha bahūpakāro’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tuvañca me licchavi ekadesaṃ, adāsi dānāni amoghametaṃ;
content.gathalast: Svāhaṃ karissāmi tayāva sakkhiṃ, amānuso mānusakena saddhi’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Gatī ca bandhū ca parāyaṇañcaparāyanañcaparāyanañca , mitto mamāsi atha devatā me devatāsi (sī. syā.);
content.gathalast: Yācāmi taṃ yācāmahaṃ (sī.) pañjaliko bhavitvā, icchāmi taṃ yakkha punāpi daṭṭhu’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sace tuvaṃ assaddho bhavissasi, kadariyarūpo vippaṭipannacitto;
content.gathalast: Tvaṃ neva maṃ lacchasiteneva maṃ na lacchasīteneva maṃ licchaviteneva maṃ lacchasi dassanāya, disvā ca taṃ nopi ca ālapissaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sace pana tvaṃ bhavissasi dhammagāravo, dāne rato saṅgahitattabhāvo;
content.gathalast: Opānabhūto samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ, evaṃ mamaṃ lacchasi dassanāya.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Disvā ca taṃ ālapissaṃ bhadante, imañca sūlato lahuṃ pamuñca;
content.gathalast: Yato nidānaṃ akarimha sakkhiṃ, maññāmi sūlāvutakassa kāraṇā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Te aññamaññaṃ akarimha sakkhiṃ, ayañca sūlatosūlāvutosūlāvuto lahuṃ pamutto;
content.gatha2: Sakkacca dhammāni samācaranto, mucceyya so nirayā ca tamhā;
content.gathalast: Kammaṃ siyā aññatra vedanīyaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kappitakañca upasaṅkamitvā, tenevatenatena saha saṃvibhajitvā kāle;
content.gathalast: Sayaṃ mukhenūpanisajja puccha, so te akkhissati etamatthaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tameva bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā, pucchassu aññatthiko no ca paduṭṭhacitto;
content.gatha2: So te sutaṃ asutañcāpi dhammaṃ,
content.gathalast: Sabbampi akkhissati yathā pajāna’’nti.
content.gatha1: So tattha rahassaṃ samullapitvā, sakkhiṃ karitvāna amānusena;
content.gathalast: Pakkāmi so licchavīnaṃ sakāsaṃ, atha bravi parisaṃ sannisinnaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Suṇantu bhonto mama ekavākyaṃ, varaṃ varissaṃ labhissāmi atthaṃ;
content.gathalast: Sūlāvuto puriso luddakammo, paṇīhitadaṇḍopaṇītanaṇḍo anusattarūpoanupakkarūpo .
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ettāvatā vīsatirattimattā, yato āvuto neva jīvati na mato;
content.gathalast: Tāhaṃ mocayissāmi dāni, yathāmatiṃ anujānātu saṅgho’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Etañca aññañca lahuṃ pamuñca, ko taṃ vadethavadethātivadetha ca tathā karontaṃ;
content.gathalast: Yathā pajānāsi tathā karohi, yathāmatiṃ anujānāti saṅgho’’ti.
content.gatha1: So taṃ padesaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, sūlāvutaṃ mocayi khippameva;
content.gathalast: ‘Mā bhāyi sammā’ti ca taṃ avoca, tikicchakānañca upaṭṭhapesi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kappitakañca upasaṅkamitvā, teneva sahatena samaṃtena sahatena saha saṃvibhajitvā kāle;
content.gathalast: Sayaṃ mukhenūpanisajja licchavi, tatheva pucchittha naṃ kāraṇatthiko.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sūlāvuto puriso luddakammo, paṇītadaṇḍo anusattarūpo;
content.gathalast: Ettāvatā vīsatirattimattā, yato āvuto neva jīvati na mato.
content.gatha1: ‘‘So mocito gantvā mayā idāni, etassa yakkhassa vaco hi bhante;
content.gathalast: Siyā nu kho kāraṇaṃ kiñcideva, yena so nirayaṃ no vajeyya.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ācikkha bhante yadi atthi hetu, saddhāyikaṃ hetuvaco suṇoma;
content.gathalast: Na tesaṃ kammānaṃ vināsamatthi, avedayitvā idha byantibhāvo’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sace sa dhammāni samācareyya, sakkacca rattindivamappamatto;
content.gathalast: Mucceyya so nirayā ca tamhā, kammaṃ siyā aññatra vedanīya’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Aññāto ñātomhi (ka.) eso purisassa attho, mamampi dāni anukampa bhante;
content.gathalast: Anusāsa maṃ ovada bhūripañña, yathā ahaṃ no nirayaṃ vajeyya’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ajjeva buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ upehi, dhammañca saṅghañca pasannacitto;
content.gathalast: Tatheva sikkhāya padāni pañca, akhaṇḍaphullāni samādiyassu.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Pāṇātipātā viramassu khippaṃ, loke adinnaṃ parivajjayassu;
content.gatha2: Amajjapo mā ca musā abhāṇī, sakena dārena ca hohi tuṭṭho;
content.gathalast: Imañca ariyaṃ imañca (syā.) aṭṭhaṅgavarenupetaṃ, samādiyāhi kusalaṃ sukhudrayaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Cīvaraṃ piṇḍapātañca, paccayaṃ sayanāsanaṃ;
content.gatha2: Annaṃ pānaṃ khādanīyaṃ, vatthasenāsanāni ca;
content.gathalast: Dadāhi ujubhūtesu, vippasannena cetasā sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati (syā. ka.).
content.gatha1: ‘‘Bhikkhūpi sīlasampanne, vītarāge bahussute;
content.gathalast: Tappehi annapānena, sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Evañca dhammānikammānikammāni samācaranto, sakkacca rattindivamappamatto;
content.gathalast: Muñca tuvaṃmucceyya so tvaṃ nirayā ca tamhā, kammaṃ siyā aññatra vedanīya’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ajjeva buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ upemi, dhammañca saṅghañca pasannacitto;
content.gathalast: Tatheva sikkhāya padāni pañca, akhaṇḍaphullāni samādiyāmi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Pāṇātipātā viramāmi khippaṃ, loke adinnaṃ parivajjayāmi;
content.gatha2: Amajjapo no ca musā bhaṇāmi, sakena dārena ca homi tuṭṭho;
content.gathalast: Imañca ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgavarenupetaṃ, samādiyāmi kusalaṃ sukhudrayaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Cīvaraṃ piṇḍapātañca, paccayaṃ sayanāsanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Annaṃ pānaṃ khādanīyaṃ, vatthasenāsanāni ca.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Bhikkhū ca sīlasampanne, vītarāge bahussute;
content.gathalast: Dadāmi na vikampāmivikappāmivikappāmi , buddhānaṃ sāsane rato’’ti.
content.gatha1: Etādisā licchavi ambasakkaro, vesāliyaṃ aññataro upāsako;
content.gathalast: Saddho mudū kārakaro ca bhikkhu, saṅghañca sakkacca tadā upaṭṭhahi.
content.gatha1: Sūlāvuto ca arogo hutvā, serī sukhī pabbajjaṃ upāgami pabbajjamupagacchi (ka.);
content.gathalast: Bhikkhuñca āgamma kappitakuttamaṃ, ubhopi sāmaññaphalāni ajjhaguṃ.
content.gatha1: Etādisā sappurisāna sevanā, mahapphalā hoti sataṃ vijānataṃ;
content.gathalast: Sūlāvuto aggaphalaṃ aphassayiphussayiphussayi , phalaṃ kaniṭṭhaṃ pana ambasakkaro’’ti.
content.gatha1: vi. va. 1228 Suṇotha yakkhassa vāṇijāna ca, samāgamo yattha tadā ahosi;
content.gathalast: Yathā kathaṃ itaritarena cāpi, subhāsitaṃ tañca suṇātha sabbe.
content.gatha1: Yo so ahu rājā pāyāsi nāmanāmo , bhummānaṃ sahabyagato yasassī;
content.gathalast: So modamānova sake vimāne, amānuso mānuse ajjhabhāsīti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Vaṅke araññe amanussaṭṭhāne, kantāre appodake appabhakkhe;
content.gathalast: Suduggame vaṇṇupathassa majjhe, vaṅkaṃbhayā naṭṭhamanā manussā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Nayidha phalā mūlamayā ca santi, upādānaṃ natthi kutodha bhakkhobhikkho ;
content.gathalast: Aññatra paṃsūhi ca vālukāhi ca, tatāhi uṇhāhi ca dāruṇāhi ca.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ujjaṅgalaṃ tattamivaṃ kapālaṃ, anāyasaṃ paralokena tulyaṃ;
content.gathalast: Luddānamāvāsamidaṃ purāṇaṃ, bhūmippadeso abhisattarūpo.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Atha tumhe kena vaṇṇena, kimāsamānā imaṃ padesaṃ hi;
content.gathalast: Anupaviṭṭhā sahasā samacca, lobhā bhayā atha vā sampamūḷhā’’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Magadhesu aṅgesu ca satthavāhā, āropayitvā paṇiyaṃ puthuttaṃ;
content.gathalast: Te yāmase sindhusovīrabhūmiṃ, dhanatthikā uddayaṃ patthayānā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Divā pipāsaṃ nadhivāsayantā, yoggānukampañca samekkhamānā;
content.gathalast: Etena vegena āyāma sabbe, rattiṃ maggaṃ paṭipannā vikāle.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Te duppayātā aparaddhamaggā, andhākulā vippanaṭṭhā araññe;
content.gathalast: Suduggame vaṇṇupathassa majjhe, disaṃ na jānāma pamūḷhacittā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Idañca disvāna adiṭṭhapubbaṃ, vimānaseṭṭhañca tavañca yakkha;
content.gathalast: Tatuttariṃ jīvitamāsamānā, disvā patītā sumanā udaggā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Pāraṃ samuddassa imañca vaṇṇuṃ, vettācaraṃvettaṃ paraṃvettācāraṃ saṅkupathañca maggaṃ;
content.gathalast: Nadiyo pana pabbatānañca duggā, puthuddisā gacchatha bhogahetu.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Pakkhandiyāna vijitaṃ paresaṃ, verajjake mānuse pekkhamānā;
content.gathalast: Yaṃ vo sutaṃ vā atha vāpi diṭṭhaṃ, accherakaṃ taṃ vo suṇoma tātā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Itopi accherataraṃ kumāra, na no sutaṃ vā atha vāpi diṭṭhaṃ;
content.gathalast: Atītamānussakameva sabbaṃ, disvā na tappāma anomavaṇṇaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Vehāyasaṃ pokkharañño savanti, pahūtamalyāpahūtamālyā bahupuṇḍarīkā;
content.gathalast: Dumā cime niccaphalūpapannā, atīva gandhā surabhiṃ pavāyanti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Veḷūriyathambhā satamussitāse, silāpavāḷassa ca āyataṃsā;
content.gathalast: Masāragallā sahalohitaṅgā, thambhā ime jotirasāmayāse.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sahassathambhaṃ atulānubhāvaṃ, tesūpari sādhumidaṃ vimānaṃ;
content.gathalast: Ratanantaraṃ kañcanavedimissaṃ, tapanīyapaṭṭehi ca sādhuchannaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Jambonaduttattamidaṃ sumaṭṭho, pāsādasopāṇaphalūpapanno;
content.gathalast: Daḷho ca vaggu ca susaṅgato cavaggu sumukho susaṅgato , atīva nijjhānakhamo manuñño.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ratanantarasmiṃ bahuannapānaṃ, parivārito accharāsaṅgaṇena;
content.gathalast: Murajaālambaratūriyaghuṭṭho, abhivanditosi thutivandanāya.
content.gatha1: ‘‘So modasi nārigaṇappabodhano, vimānapāsādavare manorame;
content.gathalast: Acintiyo sabbaguṇūpapanno, rājā yathā vessavaṇo naḷinyānaḷiññaṃ .
content.gatha1: ‘‘Devo nu āsi udavāsi yakkho, udāhu devindo manussabhūto;
content.gathalast: Pucchanti taṃ vāṇijā satthavāhā, ācikkha ko nāma tuvaṃsi yakkho’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Serīsako nāma ahamhi yakkho, kantāriyo vaṇṇupathamhi gutto;
content.gathalast: Imaṃ padesaṃ abhipālayāmi, vacanakaro vessavaṇassa rañño’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Adhiccaladdhaṃ pariṇāmajaṃ te, sayaṃ kataṃ udāhu devehi dinnaṃ;
content.gathalast: Pucchanti taṃ vāṇijā satthavāhā, kathaṃ tayā laddhamidaṃ manuñña’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Nādhiccaladdhaṃ na pariṇāmajaṃ me, na sayaṃ kataṃ na hi devehi dinnaṃ;
content.gathalast: Sakehi kammehi apāpakehi, puññehi me laddhamidaṃ manuñña’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kiṃ te vataṃ kiṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, kissa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
content.gathalast: Pucchanti taṃ vāṇijā satthavāhā, kathaṃ tayā laddhamidaṃ vimāna’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Mamaṃ pāyāsīti ahu samaññā, rajjaṃ yadā kārayiṃ kosalānaṃ;
content.gathalast: Natthikadiṭṭhi kadariyo pāpadhammo, ucchedavādī ca tadā ahosiṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Samaṇo ca kho āsi kumārakassapo, bahussuto cittakathī uḷāro;
content.gathalast: So me tadā dhammakathaṃ abhāsi, diṭṭhivisūkāni vinodayī me.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tāhaṃ tassa dhammakathaṃ suṇitvā, upāsakattaṃ paṭidevayissaṃ;
content.gatha2: Pāṇātipātā virato ahosiṃ, loke adinnaṃ parivajjayissaṃ;
content.gathalast: Amajjapo no ca musā abhāṇiṃ, sakena dārena ca ahosi tuṭṭho.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, tassa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
content.gathalast: Teheva kammehi apāpakehi, puññehi me laddhamidaṃ vimāna’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Saccaṃ kirāhaṃsu narā sapaññā, anaññathā vacanaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ;
content.gathalast: Yahiṃ yahiṃ gacchati puññakammo, tahiṃ tahiṃ modati kāmakāmī.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yahiṃ yahiṃ sokapariddavo ca, vadho ca bandho ca parikkileso;
content.gathalast: Tahiṃ tahiṃ gacchati pāpakammo, na muccati duggatiyā kadācī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sammūḷharūpova jano ahosi, asmiṃ muhutte kalalīkatova;
content.gathalast: Janassimassa tuyhañca kumāra, appaccayo kena nu kho ahosī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ime ca sirīsavanāime sirīsūpavanā caimepi sirīsavanā caimepi sirīsavanā ca tātā, dibbā gandhā surabhī sampavanti;
content.gathalast: Te sampavāyanti imaṃ vimānaṃ, divā ca ratto ca tamaṃ nihantvā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Imesañca kho vassasataccayena, sipāṭikā phalati ekamekā;
content.gathalast: Mānussakaṃ vassasataṃ atītaṃ, yadagge kāyamhi idhūpapanno.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Disvānahaṃ vassasatāni pañca, asmiṃ vimāne ṭhatvāna tātā;
content.gathalast: Āyukkhayā puññakkhayā cavissaṃ, teneva sokena pamucchitosmī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kathaṃ nu soceyya tathāvidho so, laddhā vimānaṃ atulaṃ cirāya;
content.gathalast: Ye cāpi kho ittaramupapannā, te nūna soceyyuṃ parittapuññā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Anucchaviṃ ovadiyañca me taṃ, yaṃ maṃ tumhe peyyavācaṃ vadetha;
content.gathalast: Tumhe ca kho tātā mayānuguttā, yenicchakaṃ tena paletha sotthi’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Gantvā mayaṃ sindhusovīrabhūmiṃ, dhannatthikā uddayaṃ patthayānā;
content.gathalast: Yathāpayogā paripuṇṇacāgā, kāhāma serīsamahaṃ uḷāra’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Mā ceva serīsamahaṃ akattha, sabbañca vo bhavissati yaṃ vadetha;
content.gathalast: Pāpāni kammāni vivajjayātha, dhammānuyogañca adhiṭṭhahātha.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Upāsako atthi imamhi saṅghe, bahussuto sīlavatūpapanno;
content.gathalast: Saddho ca cāgī ca supesalo ca, vicakkhaṇo santusito mutīmā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sañjānamāno na musā bhaṇeyya, parūpaghātāya ca cetayeyya;
content.gathalast: Vebhūtikaṃ pesuṇaṃ no kareyya, saṇhañca vācaṃ sakhilaṃ bhaṇeyya.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sagāravo sappaṭisso vinīto, apāpako adhisīle visuddho;
content.gathalast: So mātaraṃ pitarañcāpi jantu, dhammena poseti ariyavutti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Maññe so mātāpitūnaṃ kāraṇā, bhogāni pariyesati na attahetu;
content.gathalast: Mātāpitūnañca yo accayena, nekkhammapoṇo carissati brahmacariyaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ujū avaṅko asaṭho amāyo, na lesakappena ca vohareyya;
content.gathalast: So tādiso sukatakammakārī, dhamme ṭhito kinti labhetha dukkhaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ kāraṇā pātukatomhi attanā, tasmā dhammaṃ passatha vāṇijāse;
content.gatha2: Aññatra teniha bhasmībhasmibhasma bhavetha, andhākulā vippanaṭṭhā araññe;
content.gathalast: Taṃ khippamānena lahuṃ parena, sukho have sappurisena saṅgamo’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kiṃ nāma so kiñca karoti kammaṃ, kiṃ nāmadheyyaṃ kiṃ pana tassa gottaṃ;
content.gatha2: Mayampi naṃ daṭṭhukāmamha yakkha, yassānukampāya idhāgatosi;
content.gathalast: Lābhā hi tassa yassa tuvaṃ pihesī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yo kappako sambhavanāmadheyyo, upāsako kocchaphalūpajīvī;
content.gathalast: Jānātha naṃ tumhākaṃ pesiyo so, mā kho naṃ hīḷittha supesalo so’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Jānāmase yaṃ tvaṃ pavadesi yakkha, na kho naṃ jānāma sa edisoti;
content.gathalast: Mayampi naṃ pūjayissāma yakkha, sutvāna tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ uḷāra’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ye keci imasmiṃ satthe manussā, daharā mahantā athavāpi majjhimā;
content.gathalast: Sabbeva te ālambantu vimānaṃ, passantu puññānaṃ phalaṃ kadariyā’’ti.
content.gatha1: Te tattha sabbeva ‘ahaṃ pure’ti, taṃ kappakaṃ tattha purakkhatvāpurakkhipitvā ;
content.gathalast: Sabbeva te ālambiṃsu vimānaṃ, masakkasāraṃ viya vāsavassa.
content.gatha1: Te tattha sabbeva ‘ahaṃ pure’ti, upāsakattaṃ paṭivedayiṃsu;
content.gatha2: Pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā ahesuṃ, loke adinnaṃ parivajjayiṃsu;
content.gathalast: Amajjapā no ca musā bhaṇiṃsu, sakena dārena ca ahesuṃ tuṭṭhā.
content.gatha1: Te tattha sabbeva ‘ahaṃ pure’ti, upāsakattaṃ paṭivedayitvā;
content.gathalast: Pakkāmi sattho anumodamāno, yakkhiddhiyā anumato punappunaṃ.
content.gatha1: Gantvāna te sindhusovīrabhūmiṃ, dhanatthikā uddayaṃudayaudaya patthayānā;
content.gathalast: Yathāpayogā paripuṇṇalābhā, paccāgamuṃ pāṭaliputtamakkhataṃ.
content.gatha1: Gantvāna te saṅgharaṃ sotthivanto, puttehi dārehi samaṅgibhūtā;
content.gatha2: Ānandī vittā sumanā patītā, akaṃsu serīsamahaṃ uḷāraṃ;
content.gathalast: Serīsakaṃ te pariveṇaṃ māpayiṃsu.
content.gatha1: Etādisā sappurisāna sevanā, mahatthikā dhammaguṇāna sevanā;
content.gathalast: Ekassa atthāya upāsakassa, sabbeva sattā sukhitāsukhinosukhino ahesunti.
content.gatha1: Rājā piṅgalako nāma, suraṭṭhānaṃ adhipati ahu;
content.gathalast: Moriyānaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā, suraṭṭhaṃ punarāgamā.
content.gatha1: Uṇhe majjhanhikemajjhantike kāle, rājā paṅkaṃvaṅkaṃ upāgami;
content.gathalast: Addasa maggaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ, petānaṃ taṃ vaṇṇupathaṃvaṇṇanāpathaṃvaṇṇanāpathaṃ .
content.gatha1: Sārathiṃ āmantayī rājā –
‘‘Ayaṃ maggo ramaṇīyo, khemo sovatthiko sivo;
content.gathalast: Iminā sārathi yāma, suraṭṭhānaṃ santike ito’’.
content.gatha1: Tena pāyāsi soraṭṭho, senāya caturaṅginiyā;
content.gathalast: Ubbiggarūpo puriso, soraṭṭhaṃ etadabravi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kummaggaṃ paṭipannamhā, bhiṃsanaṃ lomahaṃsanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Purato dissati maggo, pacchato ca na dissati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kummaggaṃ paṭipannamhā, yamapurisāna santike;
content.gathalast: Amānuso vāyati gandho, ghoso suyyatisūyatisūyati dāruṇo’’.
content.gatha1: Saṃviggo rājā soraṭṭho, sārathiṃ etadabravi;
content.gatha2: ‘‘Kummaggaṃ paṭipannamhā, bhiṃsanaṃ lomahaṃsanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Purato dissati maggo, pacchato ca na dissati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kummaggaṃ paṭipannamhā, yamapurisāna santike;
content.gathalast: Amānuso vāyati gandho, ghoso suyyati dāruṇo’’.
content.gatha1: Hatthikkhandhaṃ samāruyha, olokento catuddisaṃcatuddissā ;
content.gatha2: Addasa nigrodhaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ rukkhaṃ nigrodhaṃ (syā. ka.), pādapaṃ chāyāsampannaṃ;
content.gathalast: Nīlabbhavaṇṇasadisaṃ, meghavaṇṇasirīnibhaṃ.
content.gatha1: Sārathiṃ āmantayī rājā, ‘‘kiṃ eso dissati brahā;
content.gathalast: Nīlabbhavaṇṇasadiso, meghavaṇṇasirīnibho’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Nigrodho so mahārāja, pādapo chāyāsampanno;
content.gathalast: Nīlabbhavaṇṇasadiso , meghavaṇṇasirīnibho’’.
content.gatha1: Tena pāyāsi soraṭṭho, yena so dissate brahā;
content.gathalast: Nīlabbhavaṇṇasadiso, meghavaṇṇasirīnibho.
content.gatha1: Hatthikkhandhato oruyha, rājā rukkhaṃ upāgami;
content.gatha2: Nisīdi rukkhamūlasmiṃ, sāmacco saparijjano;
content.gathalast: Pūraṃ pānīyasarakaṃ, pūve vitte ca addasa.
content.gatha1: Puriso ca devavaṇṇī, sabbābharaṇabhūsito;
content.gathalast: Upasaṅkamitvā rājānaṃ, soraṭṭhaṃ etadabravi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ te mahārāja, atho te adurāgataṃ;
content.gathalast: Pivatu devo pānīyaṃ, pūve khāda arindama’’.
content.gatha1: Pivitvā rājā pānīyaṃ, sāmacco saparijjano;
content.gathalast: Pūve khāditvā pitvā ca, soraṭṭho etadabravi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Devatā nusi gandhabbo, adu sakko purindado;
content.gathalast: Ajānantā taṃ pucchāma, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Nāmhi devo na gandhabbo, nāpinamhi sakko purindado;
content.gathalast: Peto ahaṃ mahārāja, suraṭṭhā idha māgato’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kiṃsīlo kiṃsamācāro, suraṭṭhasmiṃ pure tuvaṃ;
content.gathalast: Kena te brahmacariyena, ānubhāvo ayaṃ tavā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ suṇohi mahārāja, arindama raṭṭhavaḍḍhana;
content.gathalast: Amaccā pārisajjā ca, brāhmaṇo ca purohito.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Suraṭṭhasmiṃ ahaṃ deva, puriso pāpacetaso;
content.gathalast: Micchādiṭṭhi ca dussīlo, kadariyo paribhāsako.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Dadantānaṃ karontānaṃ, vārayissaṃ bahujjanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Aññesaṃ dadamānānaṃ, antarāyakaro ahaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Vipāko natthi dānassa, saṃyamassa kuto phalaṃ;
content.gathalast: Natthi ācariyo nāma, adantaṃ ko damessati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Samatulyāni bhūtāni, kuto kule (syā. ka.) jeṭṭhāpacāyiko;
content.gathalast: Natthi balaṃ vīriyaṃ vā, kuto uṭṭhānaporisaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Natthi dānaphalaṃ nāma, na visodheti verinaṃ;
content.gathalast: Laddheyyaṃ labhate macco, niyatipariṇāmajaṃ pariṇāmajā (sī. ka.).
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Natthi mātā pitā bhātā, loko natthi ito paraṃ;
content.gathalast: Natthi dinnaṃ natthi hutaṃ, sunihitaṃ na vijjati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Yopi haneyya purisaṃ, parassa chindatepurisassa chindepurisassa chinde siraṃ;
content.gathalast: Na koci kañci hanati, sattannaṃ vivaramantare.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Acchejjābhejjo hi bhejjo (sī.), abhejjo (syā.), bhejjāsi (ka.) jīvo, aṭṭhaṃso guḷaparimaṇḍalo;
content.gathalast: Yojanānaṃ sataṃ pañca, ko jīvaṃ chettumarahati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Yathā suttaguḷe khitte, nibbeṭhentaṃ palāyati;
content.gathalast: Evameva ca so jīvo, nibbeṭhento palāyati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Yathā gāmato nikkhamma, aññaṃ gāmaṃ pavisati;
content.gathalast: Evameva ca so jīvo, aññaṃ bondiṃ pavisati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Yathā gehato nikkhamma, aññaṃ gehaṃ pavisati;
content.gathalast: Evameva ca so jīvo, aññaṃ bondiṃ pavisati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Cullāsīticuḷāsīticuḷāsīticuḷāsīti mahākappinomahākappuno , satasahassāni hi;
content.gatha2: Ye bālā ye ca paṇḍitā, saṃsāraṃ khepayitvāna;
content.gathalast: Dukkhassantaṃ karissare.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Mitāni sukhadukkhāni, doṇehi piṭakehi ca;
content.gathalast: Jino sabbaṃ pajānāti’, sammūḷhā itarā pajā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Evaṃdiṭṭhi pure āsiṃ, sammūḷho mohapāruto;
content.gathalast: Micchādiṭṭhi ca dussīlo, kadariyo paribhāsako.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Oraṃ me chahi māsehi, kālaṅkiriyā bhavissati;
content.gathalast: Ekantakaṭukaṃ ghoraṃ, nirayaṃ papatissahaṃ.
content.gatha1: pe. va. 70 ‘‘Catukkaṇṇaṃ catudvāraṃ, vibhattaṃ bhāgaso mitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Ayopākārapariyantaṃ, ayasā paṭikujjitaṃ.
content.gatha1: pe. va. 71 ‘‘Tassa ayomayā bhūmi, jalitā tejasā yutā;
content.gathalast: Samantā yojanasataṃ, pharitvā tiṭṭhati sabbadā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Vassāni satasahassāni, ghoso suyyati tāvade;
content.gathalast: Lakkho eso mahārāja, satabhāgavassakoṭiyo.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Koṭisatasahassāni , niraye paccare janā;
content.gathalast: Micchādiṭṭhī ca dussīlā, ye ca ariyūpavādino.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tatthāhaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ, dukkhaṃ vedissa vedanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Phalaṃ pāpassa kammassa, tasmā socāmahaṃ bhusaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ suṇohi mahārāja, arindama raṭṭhavaḍḍhana;
content.gathalast: Dhītā mayhaṃ mahārāja, uttarā bhaddamatthu te.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Karoti bhaddakaṃ kammaṃ, sīlesuposathe ratā;
content.gathalast: Saññatā saṃvibhāgī ca, vadaññū vītamaccharā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Akhaṇḍakārī sikkhāya, suṇhā parakulesu ca;
content.gathalast: Upāsikā sakyamunino, sambuddhassa sirīmato.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Bhikkhu ca sīlasampanno, gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi;
content.gathalast: Okkhittacakkhu satimā, guttadvāro susaṃvuto.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sapadānaṃ caramāno, agamā taṃ nivesanaṃ;
content.gathalast: ‘Tamaddasa mahārāja, uttarā bhaddamatthu te’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Pūraṃ pānīyasarakaṃ, pūve vitte ca sā adā;
content.gathalast: ‘Pitā me kālaṅkato, bhante tassetaṃ upakappatu’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Samanantarānuddiṭṭhe, vipāko udapajjatha;
content.gathalast: Bhuñjāmi kāmakāmīhaṃ, rājā vessavaṇo yathā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ suṇohi mahārāja, arindama raṭṭhavaḍḍhana;
content.gatha2: Sadevakassa lokassa, buddho aggo pavuccati;
content.gathalast: Taṃ buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gaccha, saputtadāro arindama.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena, phusanti amataṃ padaṃ;
content.gathalast: Taṃ dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gaccha, saputtadāro arindama.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Cattāro ca paṭipannāmaggapaṭipannāmaggapaṭipannā , cattāro ca phale ṭhitā;
content.gatha2: Esa saṅgho ujubhūto, paññāsīlasamāhito;
content.gathalast: Taṃ saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gaccha, saputtadāro arindama.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Pāṇātipātā viramassu khippaṃ, loke adinnaṃ parivajjayassu;
content.gathalast: Amajjapo mā ca musā abhāṇī, sakena dārena ca hohi tuṭṭho’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Atthakāmosi me yakkha, hitakāmosi devate;
content.gathalast: Karomi tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ, tvaṃsi ācariyo mama.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Upemi saraṇaṃ buddhaṃ, dhammañcāpi anuttaraṃ;
content.gathalast: Saṅghañca naradevassa, gacchāmi saraṇaṃ ahaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Pāṇātipātā viramāmi khippaṃ, loke adinnaṃ parivajjayāmi;
content.gathalast: Amajjapo no ca musā bhaṇāmi, sakena dārena ca homi tuṭṭho.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ophuṇāmiopuṇāmiophunāmiophunāmiopunāmi mahāvāte, nadiyā sīghagāmiyā;
content.gathalast: Vamāmi pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ, buddhānaṃ sāsane rato’’.
content.gatha1: Idaṃ vatvāna soraṭṭho, viramitvā pāpadassanāpāpadassanaṃpāpadassanaṃ ;
content.gathalast: Namo bhagavato katvā, pāmokkho rathamāruhīti.
content.gatha1: vi. va. 863 ‘‘Uṭṭhehi revate supāpadhamme, apārutadvāre adānasīle;
content.gathalast: Nessāma taṃ yattha thunanti duggatā, samappitāsamajjatā nerayikā dukhenā’’ti.
content.gatha1: Iccevaiccevaṃiccevaṃ vatvāna yamassa dūtā, te dve yakkhā lohitakkhā brahantā;
content.gathalast: Paccekabāhāsu gahetvā revataṃ, pakkāmayuṃ devagaṇassa santike.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ādiccavaṇṇaṃ ruciraṃ pabhassaraṃ, byamhaṃ subhaṃ kañcanajālachannaṃ;
content.gathalast: Kassetamākiṇṇajanaṃ vimānaṃ, suriyassa raṃsīriva jotamānaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Nārīgaṇā candanasāralittācandanasārānulittā , ubhato vimānaṃ upasobhayanti;
content.gathalast: Taṃ dissati suriyasamānavaṇṇaṃ, ko modati saggapatto vimāne’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Bārāṇasiyaṃ nandiyo nāmāsi, upāsako amaccharī dānapati vadaññū;
content.gathalast: Tassetamākiṇṇajanaṃ vimānaṃ, suriyassa raṃsīriva jotamānaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Nārīgaṇā candanasāralittā, ubhato vimānaṃ upasobhayanti;
content.gathalast: Taṃ dissati suriyasamānavaṇṇaṃ, so modati saggapatto vimāne’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Nandiyassāhaṃ bhariyā, agārinī sabbakulassa issarā;
content.gathalast: Bhattu vimāne ramissāmi dānahaṃ, na patthaye nirayadassanāyā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Eso te nirayo supāpadhamme, puññaṃ tayā akataṃ jīvaloke;
content.gathalast: Na hi maccharī rosako pāpadhammo, saggūpagānaṃ labhati sahabyata’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kiṃ nu gūthañca muttañca, asucī paṭidissati;
content.gathalast: Duggandhaṃ kimidaṃ mīḷhaṃ, kimetaṃ upavāyatī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Esa saṃsavako nāma, gambhīro sataporiso;
content.gathalast: Yattha vassasahassāni, tuvaṃ paccasi revate’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ;
content.gathalast: Kena saṃsavako laddho, gambhīro sataporiso’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Samaṇe brāhmaṇe cāpi, aññe vāpi vanibbake;
content.gathalast: Musāvādena vañcesi, taṃ pāpaṃ pakataṃ tayā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tena saṃsavako laddho, gambhīro sataporiso;
content.gathalast: Tattha vassasahassāni, tuvaṃ paccasi revate.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Hatthepi chindanti athopi pāde, kaṇṇepi chindanti athopi nāsaṃ;
content.gathalast: Athopi kākoḷagaṇā samecca, saṅgamma khādanti viphandamāna’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sādhu kho maṃ paṭinetha, kāhāmi kusalaṃ bahuṃ;
content.gatha2: Dānena samacariyāya, saṃyamena damena ca;
content.gathalast: Yaṃ katvā sukhitā honti, na ca pacchānutappare’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Pure tuvaṃ pamajjitvā, idāni paridevasi;
content.gathalast: Sayaṃ katānaṃ kammānaṃ, vipākaṃ anubhossasī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ko devalokato manussalokaṃ, gantvāna puṭṭho me evaṃ vadeyya;
content.gatha2: ‘Nikkhittadaṇḍesu dadātha dānaṃ, acchādanaṃ seyya sayana (sī.) mathannapānaṃ;
content.gathalast: Na hi maccharī rosako pāpadhammo, saggūpagānaṃ labhati sahabyataṃ’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sāhaṃ nūna ito gantvā, yoniṃ laddhāna mānusiṃ;
content.gatha2: Vadaññū sīlasampannā, kāhāmi kusalaṃ bahuṃ;
content.gathalast: Dānena samacariyāya, saṃyamena damena ca.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ārāmāni ca ropissaṃ, dugge saṅkamanāni ca;
content.gathalast: Papañca udapānañca, vippasannena cetasā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Cātuddasiṃ pañcadasiṃ, yā ca pakkhassa aṭṭhamī;
content.gathalast: Pāṭihāriyapakkhañca, aṭṭhaṅgasusamāgataṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Uposathaṃ upavasissaṃ, sadā sīlesu saṃvutā;
content.gathalast: Na ca dāne pamajjissaṃ, sāmaṃ diṭṭhamidaṃ mayā’’ti.
content.gatha1: Iccevaṃ vippalapantiṃ, phandamānaṃ tato tato;
content.gathalast: Khipiṃsu niraye ghore, uddhaṃpādaṃ avaṃsiraṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ahaṃ pure maccharinī ahosiṃ, paribhāsikā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ;
content.gathalast: Vitathena ca sāmikaṃ vañcayitvā, paccāmahaṃ niraye ghorarūpe’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Idaṃ mama ucchuvanaṃ mahantaṃ, nibbattati puññaphalaṃ anappakaṃ;
content.gathalast: Taṃ dāni me nana dāni me taṃna dāni me taṃ paribhogameti, ācikkha bhante kissa ayaṃ vipāko.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Haññāmivihaññāmi khajjāmi ca vāyamāmi, parisakkāmi paribhuñjituṃ kiñci;
content.gathalast: Svāhaṃ chinnathāmo kapaṇo lālapāmi, kissakissassakissassu kammassa ayaṃ vipāko.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Vighāto cāhaṃ paripatāmi chamāyaṃ, parivattāmi vāricarova ghamme;
content.gatha2: Rudato ca medūrato ca medūrato ca me assukā niggalanti, ācikkha bhante kissa ayaṃ vipāko.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Chāto kilanto ca pipāsito ca, santassito sātasukhaṃ na vinde;
content.gathalast: Pucchāmi taṃ etamatthaṃ bhadante, kathaṃ nu ucchuparibhogaṃ labheyya’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Pure tuvaṃ kammamakāsi attanā, manussabhūto purimāya jātiyā;
content.gathalast: Ahañca taṃ etamatthaṃ vadāmi, sutvāna tvaṃ etamatthaṃ vijāna.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ucchuṃ tuvaṃ khādamāno payāto, puriso ca te piṭṭhito anvagacchi;
content.gathalast: So ca taṃ paccāsanto kathesi, tassa tuvaṃ na kiñci ālapittha.
content.gatha1: ‘‘So ca taṃ abhaṇantaṃ ayāci, ‘dehayya ucchu’nti ca taṃ avoca;
content.gathalast: Tassa tuvaṃ piṭṭhito ucchuṃ adāsi, tassetaṃ kammassa ayaṃ vipāko.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Iṅgha tvaṃ gantvāna piṭṭhito gaṇheyyāsiiṅgha tvaṃ piṭṭhito gaṇha ucchuṃ , gahetvāna taṃ khādassu yāvadatthaṃ;
content.gathalast: Teneva tvaṃ attamano bhavissasi, haṭṭho cudaggo ca pamodito cā’’ti.
content.gatha1: Gantvāna so piṭṭhito aggahesi, gahetvāna taṃ khādi yāvadatthaṃ;
content.gathalast: Teneva so attamano ahosi, haṭṭho cudaggo ca pamodito cāti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sāvatthi nāma nagaraṃ, himavantassa passato;
content.gathalast: Tattha āsuṃ dve kumārā, rājaputtāti me sutaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sammattāpamattā rajanīyesu, kāmassādābhinandino;
content.gathalast: Paccuppannasukhe giddhā, na te passiṃsunāgataṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Te cutā ca manussattā, paralokaṃ ito gatā;
content.gathalast: Tedha ghosentyadissantā, pubbe dukkaṭamattano.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Bahūsu vata bahussutesu (sī. ka.) santesu, deyyadhamme upaṭṭhite;
content.gathalast: Nāsakkhimhā ca attānaṃ, parittaṃ kātuṃ sukhāvahaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Kiṃ tato pāpakaṃ assa, yaṃ no rājakulā cutā;
content.gathalast: Upapannā pettivisayaṃ, khuppipāsasamappitākhuppipāsāsamappitākhuppipāsāsamappitā .
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sāmino idha hutvāna, honti asāmino tahiṃ;
content.gathalast: Bhamanticaranticarantimaranti khuppipāsāya, manussā unnatonatā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Etamādīnavaṃ ñatvā, issaramadasambhavaṃ;
content.gatha2: Pahāya issaramadaṃ, bhave saggagato naro;
content.gathalast: Kāyassa bhedā sappañño, saggaṃ so upapajjatī’’ti.
content.gatha1: Pubbe katānaṃ kammānaṃ, vipāko mathaye manaṃ;
content.gathalast: Rūpe sadde rase gandhe, phoṭṭhabbe ca manorame.
content.gatha1: Naccaṃ gītaṃ ratiṃ khiḍḍaṃ, anubhutvā anappakaṃ;
content.gathalast: Uyyāne paricaritvā, pavisanto giribbajaṃ.
content.gatha1: Isiṃ sunettasunita maddakkhi, attadantaṃ samāhitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Appicchaṃ hirisampannaṃ, uñche pattagate rataṃ.
content.gatha1: Hatthikkhandhato oruyha, laddhā bhanteti cābravi;
content.gathalast: Tassa pattaṃ gahetvāna, uccaṃ paggayha khattiyo.
content.gatha1: Thaṇḍile pattaṃ bhinditvā, hasamāno apakkami;
content.gathalast: ‘‘Rañño kitavassāhaṃ putto, kiṃ maṃ bhikkhu karissasi’’.
content.gatha1: Tassa kammassa pharusassa, vipāko kaṭuko ahu;
content.gathalast: Yaṃ rājaputto vedesi, nirayamhi samappito.
content.gatha1: Chaḷeva caturāsīti, vassāni navutāni ca;
content.gathalast: Bhusaṃ dukkhaṃ nigacchittho, niraye katakibbiso.
content.gatha1: Uttānopi ca paccittha, nikujjo vāmadakkhiṇo;
content.gathalast: Uddhaṃpādo ṭhito ceva, ciraṃ bālo apaccatha.
content.gatha1: Bahūni vassasahassāni, pūgāni nahutāni ca;
content.gathalast: Bhusaṃ dukkhaṃ nigacchittho, niraye katakibbiso.
content.gatha1: Etādisaṃ kho kaṭukaṃ, appaduṭṭhappadosinaṃ;
content.gathalast: Paccanti pāpakammantā, isimāsajja subbataṃ.
content.gatha1: So tattha bahuvassāni, vedayitvā bahuṃ dukhaṃ;
content.gathalast: Khuppipāsahato nāmakhuppipāsāhato nāmakhuppipāsāhato nāma , peto āsi tato cuto.
content.gatha1: Etamādīnavaṃ ñatvā disvā (sī.), issaramadasambhavaṃ;
content.gathalast: Pahāya issaramadaṃ, nivātamanuvattaye.
content.gatha1: Diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṃso, yo buddhesu sagāravo;
content.gathalast: Kāyassa bhedā sappañño, saggaṃ so upapajjatīti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Gūthakūpato uggantvā, ko nu dīno patiṭṭhasidīno hi tiṭṭhasi ;
content.gathalast: Nissaṃsayaṃ pāpakammanto, kiṃ nu saddahase tuva’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ahaṃ bhadante petomhi, duggato yamalokiko;
content.gathalast: Pāpakammaṃ karitvāna, petalokaṃ ito gato’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ;
content.gathalast: Kissa kammavipākena, idaṃ dukkhaṃ nigacchasī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ahu āvāsiko mayhaṃ, issukī kulamaccharī;
content.gathalast: Ajjhosito mayhaṃ ghare, kadariyo paribhāsako.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tassāhaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, bhikkhavo paribhāsisaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tassa kammavipākena, petalokaṃ ito gato’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Amitto mittavaṇṇena, yo te āsi kulūpako;
content.gathalast: Kāyassa bhedā duppañño, kiṃ nu pecca gatiṃ gato’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tassevāhaṃ pāpakammassa, sīse tiṭṭhāmi matthake;
content.gathalast: So ca paravisayaṃ patto, mameva paricārako.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ bhadante hadantaññe, etaṃ me hoti bhojanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Ahañca kho yaṃ hadāmi, etaṃ so upajīvatī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Gūthakūpato uggantvā, kā nu dīnā patiṭṭhasi;
content.gathalast: Nissaṃsayaṃ pāpakammantā, kiṃ nu saddahase tuva’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ahaṃ bhadante petīmhi, duggatā yamalokikā;
content.gathalast: Pāpakammaṃ karitvāna, petalokaṃ ito gatā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ;
content.gathalast: Kissa kammavipākena, idaṃ dukkhaṃ nigacchasī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ahu āvāsiko mayhaṃ, issukī kulamaccharī;
content.gathalast: Ajjhosito mayhaṃ ghare, kadariyo paribhāsako.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tassāhaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, bhikkhavo paribhāsisaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tassa kammavipākena, petalokaṃ ito gatā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Amitto mittavaṇṇena, yo te āsi kulūpako;

content.gathalast: So ca paravisayaṃ patto, mameva paricārako.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ bhadante hadantaññe, etaṃ me hoti bhojanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Ahañca kho yaṃ hadāmi, etaṃ so upajīvatī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Naggā dubbaṇṇarūpāttha, kisā dhamanisanthatā;
content.gathalast: Upphāsulikāuppāsuḷikā kisikā, ke nu tumhettha mārisā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Mayaṃ bhadante petāmhā, duggatā yamalokikā;
content.gathalast: Pāpakammaṃ karitvāna, petalokaṃ ito gatā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ;
content.gathalast: Kissa kammavipākena, petalokaṃ ito gatā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Anāvaṭesu titthesu, vicinimhaddhamāsakaṃ;
content.gathalast: Santesu deyyadhammesu, dīpaṃ nākamha attano.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Nadiṃ upema tasitā, rittakā parivattati;
content.gathalast: Chāyaṃ upema uṇhesu, ātapo parivattati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Aggivaṇṇo ca no vāto, ḍahanto upavāyati;
content.gathalast: Etañca bhante arahāma, aññañca pāpakaṃ tato.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Api yojanāniadhiyojanāniadhiyojanāni gacchāma, chātā āhāragedhino;
content.gathalast: Aladdhāva nivattāma, aho no appapuññatā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Chātā pamucchitā bhantā, bhūmiyaṃ paṭisumbhitā;
content.gathalast: Uttānā paṭikirāma, avakujjā patāmase.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Te ca tattheva patitātattha papahitā , bhūmiyaṃ paṭisumbhitā;
content.gathalast: Uraṃ sīsañca ghaṭṭema, aho no appapuññatā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Etañca bhante arahāma, aññañca pāpakaṃ tato;
content.gathalast: Santesu deyyadhammesu, dīpaṃ nākamha attano.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Te hi nūna ito gantvā, yoniṃ laddhāna mānusiṃ;
content.gathalast: Vadaññū sīlasampannā, kāhāma kusalaṃ bahu’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Diṭṭhā tayā nirayā tiracchānayoni,
content.gatha2: Petā asurā athavāpi mānusā devā; Sayamaddasa kammavipākamattano,
content.gathalast: Nessāmi taṃ pāṭaliputtamakkhataṃ; Tattha gantvā kusalaṃ karohi kammaṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Atthakāmosi me yakkha, hitakāmosi devate;
content.gathalast: Karomi tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ, tvaṃsi ācariyo mama.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Diṭṭhā mayā nirayā tiracchānayoni, petā asurā athavāpi mānusā devā;
content.gathalast: Sayamaddasaṃ kammavipākamattano, kāhāmi puññāni anappakānī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ayañca te pokkharaṇī surammā, samā sutitthā ca mahodakā ca;
content.gathalast: Supupphitā bhamaragaṇānukiṇṇā, kathaṃ tayā laddhā ayaṃ manuññā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Idañca te ambavanaṃ surammaṃ, sabbotukaṃ dhārayatedhārayatidhārayati phalāni;
content.gathalast: Supupphitaṃ bhamaragaṇānukiṇṇaṃ, kathaṃ tayā laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ambapakkaṃ dakaṃambapakkodakaṃambapakkodakaṃambapakkodakaṃambapakkūdakaṃ yāgu, sītacchāyā manoramā;
content.gathalast: Dhītāya dinnadānena, tena me idha labbhati’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sandiṭṭhikaṃ kammaṃ evaṃsandiṭṭhikaṃ eva passatha, dānassa damassa saṃyamassa vipākaṃ;
content.gathalast: Dāsī ahaṃ ayyakulesu hutvā, suṇisā homi agārassa issarā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ dadāti na taṃ hoti, detheva dānaṃ datvā ubhayaṃ tarati;
content.gatha2: Ubhayaṃ tena dānenatena gacchati, jāgaratha māpamajjathā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Mayaṃ bhoge saṃharimha, samena visamena ca;
content.gathalast: Te aññe paribhuñjanti, mayaṃ dukkhassa bhāginī’’ti.
content.gatha1: jā. 1.4.54 jātakepi ‘‘Saṭṭhivassasahassāni, paripuṇṇāni sabbaso;
content.gathalast: Niraye paccamānānaṃ, kadā anto bhavissati’’.
content.gatha1: jā. 1.4.55 jātakepi ‘‘Natthi anto kuto anto, na anto paṭidissati;
content.gathalast: Tathā hi pakataṃ pāpaṃ, tuyhaṃ mayhañca mārisāmama tuyhañca mārisamama tuyhañca mārisamama tuyhañca mārisa .
content.gatha1: jā. 1.4.53 jātakepi ‘‘Dujjīvitamajīvamha , ye sante na dadamhase;
content.gathalast: Santesu deyyadhammesu, dīpaṃ nākamha attano.
content.gatha1: jā. 1.4.56 jātakepi ‘‘Sohaṃ nūna ito gantvā, yoniṃ laddhāna mānusiṃ;
content.gathalast: Vadaññū sīlasampanno, kāhāmi kusalaṃ bahu’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kiṃ nu ummattarūpova, migo bhantova dhāvasi;
content.gathalast: Nissaṃsayaṃ pāpakammantopāpakammaṃpāpakammaṃ , kiṃ nu saddāyase tuva’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ahaṃ bhadante petomhi, duggato yamalokiko;
content.gathalast: Pāpakammaṃ karitvāna, petalokaṃ ito gato.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Saṭṭhi kūṭasahassāni, paripuṇṇāni sabbaso;
content.gathalast: Sīse mayhaṃ nipatanti, te bhindanti ca matthaka’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ;
content.gathalast: Kissa kammavipākena, idaṃ dukkhaṃ nigacchasi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Saṭṭhi kūṭasahassāni, paripuṇṇāni sabbaso;
content.gathalast: Sīse tuyhaṃ nipatanti, te bhindanti ca matthaka’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Athaddasāsiṃ sambuddhaṃ, sunettaṃ bhāvitindriyaṃ;
content.gathalast: Nisinnaṃ rukkhamūlasmiṃ, jhāyantaṃ akutobhayaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sālittakappahārena, bhindissaṃ tassa matthakaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tassa kammavipākena, idaṃ dukkhaṃ nigacchisaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Saṭṭhi kūṭasahassāni, paripuṇṇāni sabbaso;
content.gathalast: Sīse mayhaṃ nipatanti, te bhindanti ca nipatanti, vo bhindanteva (sī. dhammapadaṭṭhakathā) matthaka’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Dhammena te kāpurisa, saṭṭhikūṭasahassāni, paripuṇṇāni sabbaso;
content.gathalast: Sīse tuyhaṃ nipatanti, te bhindanti ca matthaka’’nti.
content.gatha1: Ambasakkaro serīsako, piṅgalo revati ucchu;
content.gathalast: Dve kumārā duve gūthā, gaṇapāṭaliambavanaṃ.
content.gatha1: Akkharukkhabhogasaṃharā, seṭṭhiputtasaṭṭhikūṭā;
content.gathalast: Iti soḷasavatthūni, vaggo tena pavuccati.
content.gatha1: Urago uparivaggo, cūḷamahāti catudhā;
content.gathalast: Vatthūni ekapaññāsaṃ, catudhā bhāṇavārato.
